question.text: Regardless of job title, all members of the university community must do which of the following (single answer)
question.option: Communicate the requirements of the Child Protection Policy.
Develop departmental procedures regarding the reporting of inappropriate conduct.
Keep state licenses current and prominently displayed.

question.text: University sponsored programs that include children, and units responsible for university facilities that are used by programs including children, must maintain an up-to-date list of those programs.

Organizations unrelated to the University that utilize University owned and leased facilities for programs which involve children are exempt from adhering to the Child Protection Policy because they are off-campus organizations.
